page.title: 07CHESSINGTON ZOO (5)
page.content:
FEATURES We have a Xmas Circus, run by Tamara Hassani, the daughter of Coco the Clown. It is a strictly non-animal circus. The zoo is currently making a profit, thanks to our takings from entrance fees, fairground rides, merchandising, the amusement arcade & the sale of programmes & refresh- ments. Wedding receptions can be held at the "Burnt Stub" restaurant,where we also hold mediaeval banquets.
{INTERVIEWERS...... {Helen Adsett Julie Ayers {Lynne Biltcliffe Lisa Duff {Christopher Langley {Susannah Robb Kirsty Williams
